definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[אחרין]] Da 4:5 Kt, [[וְעַד אחרין עַל קֳדָ מַי דָּנִיֵּאל]]; very dub. (v. Comm.); usu. and unto the last (= at last) came in, etc.; but word in this sense unknown: Qr [[אָחֳרָן]]; read perh. (Bev) [[וְעׂד אָחֳרָן]] (or ? Kt [[אַחֲרִין]]; cf.0h.ryn) and yet another came in before me.
